meta.name: description
meta.content: Holliday ISD is a Pre-K - 12 Public School serving Northern Archer and Southwestern Wichita Counties located in Holliday Texas.

img.alt: Holliday ISD Welcomes New Head Band Director

div.h3: Holliday ISD Welcomes New Head Band Director
div.div: Holliday ISD is pleased to welcome Dane Richardson as our new Head Band Director. Dane earned his Bachelor’s Degree in Music from Angelo State University and a Master’s Degree in Music Education . . .

div.h3: Holliday ISD At-Home Learning Grading Procedures
